import { Carousel } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useContext } from "react"; import { ModeContext } from "./ModeContext"; function SlideShow() { const [show, setShowlanguage, setLanguage]= useContext(ModeContext); return (

{language.header.title}

Beauty is that which is simultaneously attractive and sublime.

Beauty is whatever gives joy.

A beautiful life begins at home" — that's our motto. Be mindful of the things, places and relationships that give you joy by contemplating these eloquent words of wisdom.

We Serve you.

We make you look better.

Let us make your place more beauty.

Life is for service. And we like to do that for you.
); } export default SlideShow;
